name: The Sound of Sirens Demo
description:
Safely guide your ambulances and rescue all the sickly patients in The Sound of Sirens! 

In 32 demo levels you will:

- Guide ambulances with arrows!

- Avoid dangerous obstacles!

- Rescue sickly patients!

- Open locked gates!

- Traverse crumbling rafts!

We appreciate your feedback so that we can make improvements before our full release of over 75+ levels and several new puzzle mechanics coming Wednesday, February 8th!

Demo completion progress can be transferred to full release of The Sound of Sirens using the password: Garfunkel

Instructions:

Requires mouse, optional keyboard controls

Interact / Place Arrow / Rotate Arrow - Left Click

Remove Arrow - Right Click

Exit Level/Menu - ESC 

Reset Level - R

We've also implemented a manual and hint system to lend you a helping hand if you feel stuck when solving levels. Happy puzzling!
